Reviews.Title: Ehh, alright..
Reviews.Author: Betoo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item to give me a temporary phone to use and then give to a sibling once I got the new iphone. The function was pretty slow, since it was jail broken. Other than that it was ok for the time I have used it. The shipping was pretty good and other than one system crash and the lagging I'm satisfied. I'm going to the apple store to fix up any bugs and get it to function good again. Otherwise I'm greatful for the service the phone gave me.

Reviews.Title: Unable to do anything with the new apps that are out.
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: This I phone cannot be updated to use any of the current apps that are online.  I would be better to get an iphone 3s or better an iphone 4

Reviews.Title: saludos
Reviews.Author: richard conil
Reviews.Content: bien por el envio y la rapides de la atenciom prestada muy eficiente lo tomaremosn en cuenta para proximos pedidos
